author: timesunion.com
title: Rodger's Quick Take
text: The only thing that can stop the Giants right now is a rash of injuries to their wide-receiving corps. Guess what? There is a chance that Odell Beckham Jr. , Rueben Randle and Victor Cruz won't play in Monday night's showdown at Philadelphia, with first place on the line in the NFC East. Cruz hasn't played yet this season, but how do you expect the Giants to beat the Eagles without Beckham and Randle? Beckham and Randle injured their hamstrings Sunday night, and head coach Tom Coughlin said there are no guarantees they will be ready. If that's the case, Eli Manning 's top receivers are: Dwayne Harris , Geremy Davis and Myles White Sorry, but you can't win with that trio. NewsChannel 13's Rodger Wyland can be heard weekdays from 9 a.m. to noon on WOFX 980 AM.
